item.title: Get Data from Website
item.description: Motivation Solutions Download Uncompress data files Load libsvm format data Complete Code Motivation Iâ€™m using the datasets libsvm to do some numerical experiments. The sizes of datasets, like epsilon, are of severalGBs. So it is hard to play with the data on my desktop. I am lucky to run the experiments on a server. So my workflow is: Download datasets on the server. Preprocess datastes. Run experiments.
